testsuite.name: Using the rally utilities When counting time

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should count the number of days as 0 if the same time

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should count the number of days as 0 when different times, same day

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should count the number of days as 1 on the different days

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should count the number of days between two dates

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should count the number of days between two dates, beginning and end

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should not care if the days are supplied out of order

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should count weekends in date difference

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should not count weekends in date difference when flag set

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should not count weekends in date difference across two weekends when flag set

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should return 0 when on a Saturday and not counting weekends in date difference

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should shift beginning Saturday to Monday if not counting weekends in difference

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should shift beginning Sunday to Monday if not counting weekends in difference

testcase.classname: Using the rally utilities When counting time
testcase.name: should shift ending Sunday to Monday if not counting weekends in difference
